td.content: s:a white male aged 36 yrs presents with mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat x 2 weeks. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 181 cm, Weight 57.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:patient presents with Neurological. he is a white male aged 37 years. Patient does not smoke he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 180 cm, Weight 56.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, B burgdorferi Ab, CSF ELISA 1.21 LIV(+) a:Paralysis p:administered Immune globulin - 2000 mg/kg IV divided doses over 2 days, performed B burgdorferi Ab, CSF ELISA, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
